txt.en: 'You wish for me to protect a chicken coop? Until I was wounded, I fed my cub by stealing chickens.\n\n'Well, I would rather steal them, than chase them, so begone with you.'
George feels that help must be found from beyond the Shire to defend against the invading wolves.
Talk to creatures of Ered Luin
The lynx-mother is at Thrasi's Lodge in Ered Luin, north of Celondim and Duillond.\n\nGeorge has asked you to speak to the creatures of Ered Luin. You should seek out and speak with the lynx-mother.
